DOC.brief_summary: Recent evidence support detrimental effect advance glycation endproducts ( AGE ) vascular function ( VF ) . Though , effect AGE-modified protein alone vascular function remain unknown . Therefore , aim study investigate effect heat-treated , glycated beta-lactoglobulins ( BLG ) vascular function subject type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) compare non-glycated , heat-treated BLG .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Food Advanced Glycation Endproducts Vascular Function Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: In double-blind , control , randomize , cross-over manner , 19 subject T2DM receive 2 different day beverages contain either glycated , heat-treated BLG non-glycated , heat-treated BLG . Macrovascular ( brachial ultrasound flow mediate dilatation -FMD ) microvascular function ( laser-doppler measurement reactive hyperemia hand ) baseline ( T0 ) , well 90 ( T90 ) 180 ( T180 ) minute beverage measure .
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus Other type diabetes Major cardiovascular complication within 6 month prior screen Major diabetes complication Failure give inform consent
